title: Video: WU LYF – Brooklyn Girls / Summas Bliss
content: Fresh from their recent tour of the US, Manchester quartet WU LYF have released this gorgeous little video shot during their time in New York, filmed by ABF, the same people who produced the video for Concrete Gold. Featuring Francis Lung’s Brooklyn Girls and WU LYF’s Summas Bliss, it’s a fitting tribute to one of the finest acts around at the moment. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
